title: Alice Mattison Reads Lore Segal
description: Alice Mattison joins Deborah Treisman to read and discuss Lore Segal’s “The First American,” from a 1983 issue of the magazine.
content:encoded: Alice Mattison reads "The First American" by Lore Segal.
